name: John Rodgers
text: Hands down the best pizza in town especially for the price. I've been to other Hungry Howie's locations but this one has always been consistently the best. Try the garlic herb crust.... can't beat it. All the other food they serve like the pasta and subs are also quality and filling.

Absolutely fantastic, very good service.
